doc:
Gertrude Short https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gertrude_Short 0 Carmen Gertrude Short (April 6, 1902 – July 31, 1968) was an American film actress of the silent and early sound era. She appeared in 132 films between 1912 and 1945. She was born in Cincinnati, Ohio, and died in Hollywood, California, aged 66, from a heart attack. One of her siblings was Antrim Short. Blanche Sweet was a cousin. Carmen_Gertrude_Short ( April_6_,_1902 – July_31_,_1968 ) was an_American_film_actress of the_silent_and_early_sound_era . She appeared in 132_films between 1912_and_1945 . She was_born in Cincinnati , Ohio , and died in Hollywood , California , aged 66 , from a_heart_attack . One of her_siblings was Antrim_Short . Blanche_Sweet was a_cousin .
